reward.student_learning: When performing complex quantitative analysis, ensure meticulous final review of all numerical outputs, especially sums and final values, to catch minor calculation inconsistencies or typos. While the underlying logic and calculation steps may be correct, presentation errors in final figures can diminish the perceived accuracy and trustworthiness of the overall analysis.

steps.description:
Produce the complete answer for the task in a single response.
Ensure the output matches the requested format and includes any necessary reasoning.
